      • createTempMedicine

        public Medicine createTempMedicine​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> reqParameters,
                                   boolean newMedicine,
                                   int rub,
                                   int kop)
        The method for creating temporary medicine before inserting into database. Uses CommonService.isNumber(String), CommonService.isStringDate(String)
        Parameters:
        reqParameters - - request parameters from jsp
        newMedicine - - is medicine new (false for editing medicine)
        rub - - a rub part of medicine price
        kop - - a coin part of medicine price
        Returns:
        - medicine instance if process was successful or medicine with ID=-1
